channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-2509|2024-08-01T19:18:46.944Z -- unknown -- gutenberg%20blocks%20by%20kadence%20blocks
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.2.26 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-2509|2024-06-10T17:46:21.566Z -- unknown -- gutenberg%20blocks%20by%20kadence%20blocks
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks by Kadence Blocks WordPress plugin before 3.2.26 does not validate and escape some of its block options before outputting them back in a page/post where the block is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
